mapper.select: SELECT C.COMMENT_ID, C.USER_ID, C.CONTENT, C.LIKE_COUNT, C.COMMENT_DATE, C.RE_LEV, C.RE_SEQ, C.RE_REF, M.NICKNAME FROM COMMENTS C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.USER_ID = M.USER_ID WHERE C.POST_ID = #{post_id} ORDER BY C.RE_REF ASC, C.RE_SEQ ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS (COMMENT_ID, POST_ID, USER_ID, CONTENT, LIKE_COUNT, COMMENT_DATE, RE_REF, RE_LEV, RE_SEQ, REPORT_COUNT) VALUES (POST_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{post_id}, #{user_id}, #{content}, 0, SYSDATE, #{re_ref}, #{re_lev}, #{re_seq}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENTS SET RE_SEQ = RE_SEQ + 1 WHERE RE_REF = #{re_ref} AND RE_SEQ > #{re_seq}
